I disagree that Bakunin opposes hierarchical authority. You're making up your own definition of anarchism. You're trying to take the opinion of just a few anarchists and generalize to all anarchists.

restore passage on widespread reasons
"Without bosses" is not supported by the reference.
You can't pick a few anarchists and then generalize a definition for all anarchists. There are anarchists who do not oppose "hierarchical authority" if it's non-compulsory.

terminology arguments are inappropriate for intro
Others disagree that it's socialist since it doesn't fit today's definition.
how about "have been considered"?
